title: How do I check my B1's battery level?
answer:
Method 1: Press the side button to turn on the B1 screen. Go to the time screen, and you can check the battery level indicator on the right of the screen. 

 Method 2: If your B1 is properly connected to your phone, check the battery level indicator in the upper right corner of your Huawei TalkBand app's settings screen. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=47361)
